title: APPLICATION FOR A VARIANCE OR SPECIAL EXCEPTION
content:
(A)

A person may file an application for a variance with the single office for a variance
to be granted by the platting board or the council.

(B)

An application may include a request for:

(1)

variances from regulations applicable to the same site; or

(2)

similar variances on two or more adjacent parcels with similar characteristics.

(C)

The single office may require that the applicant provide information that the single
office determines is necessary to evaluate the variance request.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-211; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.

For an application for a variance requiring consideration by the platting board, the
single office shall prepare and file a report with the platting board not later than
the 11th day before the public hearing.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-212; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
